This blend file has been created by Alberto Vicente (OdinTdh) and is published under CC BY-SA 4.0
To create the diffuse texture inside this blend I have used:
Greek_key_on_a_Renaissance_Revival_stove_in_the_in_the_D.A._Sturdza_House from Wikimedia Commons created by Beautiful Buildings Pics and licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0
Theseus Athena Amphitrite Louvre G104.jpg from Wikipedia and published under public domain
sandstone_blocks_04_2k_jpg from Texture Heaven published under CC0 (public domain)
floor_tiles_04_2k_jpg from Texture Heaven published under CC0 (public domain)
